solution:
```python
def draw_flag(w, h, c):
    # Draw top border
    print("+", end="")
    for _ in range(w - 2):
        print("-", end="")
    print("+")

    # Draw middle rows
    for _ in range(h - 2):
        print("|", end="")
        for _ in range(w - 2):
            print(".", end="")
        print("|")

    # Draw bottom border
    print("+", end="")
    for _ in range(w - 2):
        print("-", end="")
    print("+")

    # Draw center character
    print("|", end="")
    for _ in range((w - 2) // 2):
        print(".", end="")
    print(c, end="")
    for _ in range((w - 2) // 2):
        print(".", end="")
    print("|")

# Get input from user
w, h, c = input().split()
w, h, c = int(w), int(h), c

# Draw flag
draw_flag(w, h, c)
```
